sentence.Network_en: One kilobit ( Kb ) is 1024 bits. One megabit ( Mb ) is 1024 kilobits. One gigabit ( Gb ) is 1024 megabits.
sentence.Network_cn: 一格千比是1024比特. 一兆比是1024千比特. 一吉比是1024兆比.

百万位元组 (MegaByte) 或百万位元 (MegaBit) 的缩写－英文小写 b 应该表示是 MegaBit，但并非人人都遵循此习惯，1 百万位元组等 …
1兆比特（megabit）相当于1 0 0 万次二元脉冲。兆字节/ 秒（MB/s）也是数据传输率单位，但它通常用于计算机运算领域。

auth_sentence.content: Theoretically, Bluetooth can support voice, video, and data transmissions up to 1 megabit per second.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theoretically, Bluetooth can support voice, video, and data transmissions up to 1 megabit per second.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theoretically, Bluetooth can support voice, video, and data transmissions up to 1 megabit per second.

auth_sentence.content: With a download speed of about one megabit per second, it won't work well for data-heavy video-streaming, Mr. Owens said.
